H0.text: Which legendary dancer was Oscar-nominated for The Towering Inferno. Gene Kelly

H1.text: Which legendary dancer was Oscar-nominated for The Towering Inferno. Gregory Hines

H2.text: Which legendary dancer was Oscar-nominated for The Towering Inferno. Sammy Davis Jr.

H3.text: Which legendary dancer was Oscar-nominated for The Towering Inferno. Fred Astair

A4.text: For his performance in Irwin Allen and John Guillermin's disaster film, The Towering Inferno (1974), Astaire received his only competitive Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor
